members.name: SpeechRecognitionEvent.emma
members.description: Returns an Extensible MultiModal Annotation markup language (EMMA) — XML — representation of the result.

members.name: SpeechRecognitionEvent.interpretation
members.description: Returns the semantic meaning of what the user said.

members.name: SpeechRecognitionEvent.resultIndex
members.description: Returns the lowest index value result in the SpeechRecognitionResultList "array" that has actually changed.

members.name: SpeechRecognitionEvent.results
members.description: Returns a SpeechRecognitionResultList object representing all the speech recognition results for the current session.
